name: Bullet
overview: Published in Hit Parade 64 N°11 (04/1987). The explosion of a reactor where the capritionide was produced triggered a chemical reaction that caused variations in the stratosphere, plunging the Earth into meteorological chaos. The only way to resolve the situation is to be able to set in motion the neo-time machine discovered by scientists to bring everything back to before the disaster. You have volunteered to operate all the flag-marked switches that are used to operate this extraordinary discovery. But be very careful because you will have to overcome some pitfalls before being able to complete your mission.
